# real-controle-oe

Software for personal finance management made with ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Progress-OpenEdge-brightgreen?logo=data:image/png;base64,).
- Maintenance: item, bank account, cost center
- Bank entries: post income/expenses with the option to replicate or pay in installments over a certain number of times. Possible to edit and delete movement.
- Reports: bank statement per account and unified between accounts; cash flow per account and unified between accounts, for the selected period.

---
Check-out the [demo video here](https://youtu.be/9foU0SFXx8s?si=ebuu6rmB7qGxJS00)
